## Description

Manage Radius environments

## Usage

```bash
rad env [command]
```

## Flags

| Flag | Default | Description |
|------|---------|-------------|
| `-h`, `--help` | | Print help for env

Visit the [CLI page]({{< ref "cli#global-flags" >}}) for a list of available global flags.

## Available commands
